name: Sticky Boy
description:
This game was part of a Game Dev Challenge and it was made in under 6 hours!

This is Sticky Boy!

A platformer where you play as Sticky Boy with his gun he can teleport to locations not possible to reach otherwise.

To play the game:

AWSD - movement

Left Mouse Click - Use Gun

Reset Button and Menu Buttons can be used with the mouse click.

Thank you for playing!

If you have any feedback make sure to leave it in the comments!

Happy Gaming!
